column5: Uncommon luxury, unbeatable location, and an incredible value! There's no better location or one closer to the action of South Congress. Despite being just one block off SoCo, this serene oasis is quiet and private. It includes a genuine adjustable Tempurpedic bed, expansive windows with elegant Southern shutters, a sitting area and desk, mini-fridge, microwave, coffee/tea bar, and a stunning Mexican tiled bathroom. At nearly 500 square feet, the suite is expansive and roomy. Tax not included.
column8: ❤️ of SoCo Luxury Suite: Sizzling Summer $avings!
